content: This jar of <style=Highlight>Luca</style> is now full. Here, take it, and use it to keep watering the Luca Arbor.

content: {A笑哈哈}Hoho! <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, now that more new arrivals have settled on the planet... there is more of a buzz about the place. Rest assured, I'll make sure everyone's well taken care of.
